meanings.definition: A line that divides an angle into two equal parts.
meanings.sent1: The bisectrices helped us divide the pizza equally between us.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used a bisectrices to cut the wood at the perfect angle.
meanings.sent3: The bisectrices at the party made sure everyone got an equal share of cake.
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted like a bisectrices, bringing harmony to the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher drew bisectrices on the board to explain the concept clearly.
